title: Create Lucene-Patch Build capability in Hudson
description: This issue will be used to test the creation of a "Lucene-Patch" capability in Hudson that automatically applies submitted Patches (when the Patch Available) flag is checked and then marks the issue with a +/- 1 to the bug so that committers know whether it works or not.

comments.content:
I think this is more than a "nice-to-have".

Currently its difficult to keep the code-base "releasable", perhaps adding this would reduce the amount of 'cleanup' (e.g. javadocs warnings, license violations, etc) up-front and catch problems before they are actually committed.
comments.author: Robert Muir
